snippet: At a time of immense strains brought on by the euro crisis and austerity, the horse meat scandal has brought into the open the deep divisions that bedevil Europe.
abstract: Horse meat scandal has exposed deep divisions, cultural and otherwise, that bedevil European Union;  a meat that nearly all Britons consider revolting, for example, is cherished as a protein-rich delight by a small but loyal minority in Belgium and other places; scandal has cast pall over vast common market that allows free flow of goods and services across borders.

byline.contributor: Dan Bilefsky contributed reporting from Paris, and Stephen Castle from London.

lead_paragraph: At a time of immense strains brought on by the euro crisis and austerity, the horse meat scandal has brought into the open the deep divisions that bedevil Europe.

headline.seo: Recipe for Divided Europe: Add Horse, Then Stir
headline.main: Recipe for Divided Europe: Add Horse, Then Stir
headline.print_headline: Recipe for Divided Europe: Add Horse, Then Stir
